response.answer_text: The video in the link already explains pretty well what this technology can do.But the question seems to be directed at the magic behind the curtains. Well, that is a secret, because the PurePath Technology is patent pending. The devoloper is Dynatrace and this technology is one of their main competitional advantages over the other vendors of APM systems like Appdynamics or New Relic. For people that understand German here an interview where is mentioned that Dynatrace understands itself as fundamentally different from their competition due to the PurePath Technology : Die Performance-BeschleunigerThis article Compuware Announces Convergence of dynaTrace PurePath Technology and Gomez Performance Network further underlines the importance of the PPT for Dynatrace. There is described what PPT is essentially as well. That's all one probably will find about this, the technology itself is a secret, and that for a good reason.
